title: Is it better to be influenced by books rather than movies? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would say yes and no, it depends on the sort of books and movies in question. If it’s something immersive, willing to detail a thoughtful idea or concept; then either way it’s fine. But if it’s just an action movie, or a love drama, or some kind of tie-in movie for a toy; then I would be genuinely concerned about your choice of influences. But as I said, so as long as it’s proper, the medium it’s delivered on doesn’t matter much.
